title: Replace QR payment with copyable UPI ID flow and standardize Discord invite URL usage

requirements.summary: Update Discord invite URL constant and ensure all Discord links use the shared constant
acceptanceCriteria: All UI locations that link to Discord (ContactSection, DashboardSection Support tab, PaymentPanel) navigate to `https://discord.gg/black-exe`.
No remaining occurrences of the old Discord URL (e.g., `https://discord.gg/blackexe`) are used for navigation.

file_operations.description: Change `DISCORD_INVITE_URL` to exactly `https://discord.gg/black-exe` and keep it as the single source of truth for Discord navigation.
Verify the Discord contact button uses `DISCORD_INVITE_URL` from `frontend/src/config/social.ts` (no hardcoded Discord URL).
Verify the Support tab Discord link uses `DISCORD_INVITE_URL` from `frontend/src/config/social.ts` (no hardcoded Discord URL).
Verify the payment confirmation Discord link uses `DISCORD_INVITE_URL` from `frontend/src/config/social.ts` (no hardcoded Discord URL).

requirements.summary: Replace QR-based Payment panel with an English-only UPI ID display and copy-to-clipboard control
acceptanceCriteria: The Payment panel no longer renders any QR image (no `` with QR assets, no 'Tap to enlarge', no 'Scan to Pay' QR instructions).
The Payment panel displays the exact UPI ID text `9352000693@axl` prominently inside the existing cyberpunk/glass UI styling.
A copy-to-clipboard control is present and copies `9352000693@axl` to the clipboard.
After copying, the UI provides a visible confirmation state in English (e.g., 'Copied' / 'UPI ID copied').

file_operations.description: Create a small payment config exporting the UPI ID constant `9352000693@axl` so it can be reused consistently across Payment UI and the BUY NOW flow.

Remove the entire QR image section and QR-specific instructions; replace with a UPI-ID-based UI that prominently shows `9352000693@axl`, includes a copy-to-clipboard control, and shows an English confirmation state after copying. Keep the existing cyberpunk/glass styling and retain the WhatsApp/Discord proof actions as buttons/links.

requirements.summary: Change BUY NOW/panel-card click to open an in-app payment step with UPI details and WhatsApp/Discord confirmation options (no instant WhatsApp open)
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a panel card or its "BUY NOW" button opens an in-app payment step that shows the UPI ID `9352000693@axl` with copy-to-clipboard and the payment confirmation buttons (WhatsApp and Discord).
The prior behavior of instantly opening WhatsApp on panel click/BUY NOW is removed for this interaction.
The WhatsApp confirmation link still uses the existing WhatsApp number constant `+923137863480` and remains URL-encoded.
If a panel name is available from the clicked card, the WhatsApp payment-proof message includes the panel name (using the existing `buildPaymentProofWhatsAppLink(panelName?)` capability).

file_operations.description: Replace the current behavior that opens WhatsApp on card click/BUY NOW with a callback-driven interaction (e.g., `onBuy(panelName)`), so the parent can show an in-app payment step instead of immediately opening WhatsApp. Preserve keyboard accessibility behavior.

Wire the new panel purchase interaction by tracking the selected panel name and conditionally rendering the in-app payment step (reuse `PaymentPanel` with a `panelName` prop). Ensure the payment view contains WhatsApp + Discord confirmation actions that remain available as buttons/links.

Extend `PaymentPanel` to support an optional `panelName` input for the in-app purchase flow; when provided, use `buildPaymentProofWhatsAppLink(panelName)` for the WhatsApp confirmation action and keep the Discord action using `DISCORD_INVITE_URL`. Ensure the component only presents details/actions and never auto-opens WhatsApp.
